attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We think that it is important to become one with our woodland friends. 

Working together, we can achieve this by:

-Making badgers, foxes, deers and squirrels common household pets. 

Foxes eat earthworms, rabbits, rodents, insects and carrion. Imagine your garden being free of those pests!

-Bluebells, Daffodils, Corncockle and other woodland flora into wreathes and garlands, which can then be purchased at selcted retailers. This can improve companies businesses during the recent economic downturn.

The new jobs created will decrease the level of unemployement, and introduce more competative markets for household pets and flowers; keeping inflation low whilst contributing to sustainable economic growth.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
